message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.CE 

This paper discusses network coding-based link failure recovery techniques, which are primarily related to computer networks and information theory. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also involves linear programming and integer linear programming, which are related to optimization and control systems, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) another likely sub-category. The paper also discusses coding techniques, which can be related to cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). Finally, the paper proposes a novel design algorithm that simplifies the capacity placement problem, which can be related to cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science).
